data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Al Wusta, Oman honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Wusta, Oman
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 158 believers in Al Wusta to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Al Wusta against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 158 believers in the state of Al Wusta the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken people.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Al Wusta, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Al Wusta, Oman.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Wusta, Oman has a population of 24,200.

We estimate Al Wusta has 158 people who might know Jesus, 531 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,511 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 153 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Al Wusta.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
